summary: This mod changes the meshes and textures for the Iron Longsword and replaces it with one like in Minecraft.
descriptionHtml:
More swords will be added. Check back often to see the progress.


~Minecraft Swords V1.0

~This mod changes the meshes and textures for the Iron Longsword and replaces it with one like in Minecraft. 

~Installation
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary. 
3. Copy files to (install folder) your Skyrim Data folder. 
4. Start Skyrim Launcher and play.

~Uninstallation 
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s). 
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod: 

a. \"meshes\\weapons\\iron\\1stpersonlongsword.nif\"
b. \"meshes\\weapons\\iron\\longsword.nif\"
c. \"textures\\weapons\\iron\\ironlongsword.dds\"
d. \"textures\\weapons\\iron\\ironlongsword_s.dds\"

~Incompatibility 
a. Any mod that changes the texture or mesh of the Iron Longsword.

If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Known Issues or Bugs 
a. The lighting on the sword can be buggy at times. 

If any more are found, please tell me on the comments!

~Bugs planned to fix 
a. The lighting on the sword can be buggy at times. 

~Change Log
1.0 Original Release

~Credits
a. Thanks to maniczombie and Ghogiel on the Nexus Forums for helping me fix my mesh problems. I couldn\'t have done it without them.
b. Thanks to Mojang for creating Minecraft.

~Notes
a. While the models and textures in this mod are very similar to the models from Minecraft, they are not copies. I created these models and textures myself and it took much time. While I appreciate Mojang\'s creation of the game, I am the sole creator of these models and textures.

~LoganZezima
author: LoganZezima
